availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas B. Johnson (Boone County, Kentucky, manager of farm.)

body.p: Boone County, Kentucky, manager of farm. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah J. Slater Johnson in Boone County, Kentucky on June 26, 1859. Father of William B. Johnson. Manager of farm in Boone County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Union, p. 387.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Big Bone, p. 140A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Boone County Marriages, Film #000216817, p. 18.
